message: The difficult work for victims begins when many think it's over. When a victim is recovered or escapes from trafficking that's when the long and difficult journey of healing begins.

data.description: Andrea McHenry, executive director of Freedom and Restoration for Everyone Enslaved, hopes to establish a safe house in Berks County for anyone in the region freed from the scourge.
data.title: A house for healing: Nonprofit wants to build home for human trafficking victims in Berks
